original: @119a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @119a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Canda-Mahahroshana-sadhanam-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: khro bo gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: khro bo gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Means of Achievement called The Wrathful Great Haughty One

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord Manjusri.

original: pus mo sa la btsugs shing g-yas pa'i phyag na ral gri bsnams //
analyzed: pus mo sa la btsugs shing g-yas pa'i phyag na ral gri bsnams //
translated: He places his knee on the ground, and in his right hand he holds a sword.

original: de las gzhan pa'i phyag ni sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang 'brel zhing //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i phyag ni sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang 'brel zhing //
translated: His other hand makes the threatening forefinger gesture, and is connected with a noose.

original: sra zhing mkhregs pa'i sku mnga' nyi ma lta bur gtum pa'i spyan //
analyzed: sra zhing mkhregs pa'i sku mnga' nyi ma lta bur gtum pa'i spyan //
translated: He has a firm, solid body, and his eyes are as haughty as the sun.üîΩMay he, the unmoving one who destroys obstacles and pacifies the obstacles of existence,üîΩThe Buddhas who dwell in the ten directions,

original: bgegs rnams 'joms pa'i mi g-yo srid bgegs zhi byed shog / phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang ; / byang chub sems dpa' tshogs bcas pa //üîΩde la me tog la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: bgegs rnams 'joms pa'i mi g-yo srid bgegs zhi byed shog / phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang ; / byang chub sems dpa' tshogs bcas pa // de la me tog la sogs pa'i //
translated: And the hosts of Bodhisattvas,üîΩTo them I mentally offer

original: mchod pa la sogs blos byas nas //
analyzed: mchod pa la sogs blos byas nas //
translated: Worship and so forth, with flowers and so forth.

original: sems can sdug bsngal las bskyab phyir //
analyzed: sems can sdug bsngal las bskyab phyir //
translated: In order to protect sentient beings from suffering,

original: bdag gi lus 'di dbul bar bya //
analyzed: bdag gi lus 'di dbul bar bya //
translated: I offer this body of mine.

original: dge ba 'phel phyir bsngags pa yis //
analyzed: dge ba 'phel phyir bsngags pa yis //
translated: In order to increase virtue, I praise

original: sdig pa dag ni bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: sdig pa dag ni bshags par bya'o //
translated: And confess all your evil deeds.üîΩThen, rejoice in all the merit

original: @119b de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang ni //üîΩslob ma slob sogs sems can gyi //
analyzed: @119b de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang ni // slob ma slob sogs sems can gyi //
translated: Of the perfect Buddhas, the hosts of Bodhisattvas,üîΩAnd of all sentient beings,

original: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
analyzed: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
translated: Whether learners or post-learners.

original: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song zhing //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song zhing //
translated: Having gone for refuge to the Three Jewels,

original: byang chub tu ni sems brtan nas //üîΩrim pa bzhin du tshangs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: byang chub tu ni sems brtan nas // rim pa bzhin du tshangs pa'i gnas //
translated: And having stabilized your mind in enlightenment,üîΩYou should meditate on the four Brahmaviharas

original: bzhi po yang ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bzhi po yang ni bsgom par bya //
translated: In their proper sequence.

original: de'i mtshan bral bas stong pa ste //
analyzed: de'i mtshan bral bas stong pa ste //
translated: They are empty because they are devoid of their own characteristics.

original: rgyu med pas na mtshan ma med //
analyzed: rgyu med pas na mtshan ma med //
translated: Since they are causeless, they are signless.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni dngos po rnams //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni dngos po rnams //
translated: By nature, all things

original: sman pa dang ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sman pa dang ni bsgom par bya //
translated: Are peaceful and non-arisen.

original: de nas padma nyi dbus su //
analyzed: de nas padma nyi dbus su //
translated: Then, in the center of a lotus and sun,

original: h'um las byung ba bsgom bya ste //
analyzed: h'um las byung ba bsgom bya ste //
translated: Meditate on yourself as Humkara,

original: dpa' bo spyan gnyis rab dmar zhing /
analyzed: dpa' bo spyan gnyis rab dmar zhing /
translated: A hero with two eyes, very red,

original: phyag gnyis rin chen cod pan can ;
analyzed: phyag gnyis rin chen cod pan can ;
translated: With two hands and a jeweled crown.

original: / de ma thag tu sdig 'joms mgon //
analyzed: / de ma thag tu sdig 'joms mgon //
translated: The protector who immediately destroys evil,

original: ji ltar 'dod pa rdzogs byed cing //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa rdzogs byed cing //
translated: And fulfills all wishes,

original: aa tra si yi me tog mtshungs //
analyzed: aa tra si yi me tog mtshungs //
translated: Resembling an atrisika flower.

original: dri med sangs rgyas 'od 'phro zhing //
analyzed: dri med sangs rgyas 'od 'phro zhing //
translated: The stainless Buddha radiates light,

original: tshems kyi mche bas ma mchu mnan //
analyzed: tshems kyi mche bas ma mchu mnan //
translated: pressing his lower lip with his fangs.

original: rgyan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan cing //üîΩg-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan //
analyzed: rgyan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan cing // g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan //
translated: Adorned with all the ornaments,üîΩwith a threatening mudra and noose on the left,

original: phyag g-yas 'bar ba'i ral gris brel //
analyzed: phyag g-yas 'bar ba'i ral gris brel //
translated: his right hand brandishes a flaming sword.

original: pus mo sa la btsugs pa ni //
analyzed: pus mo sa la btsugs pa ni //
translated: Kneeling on the ground,

original: 'jigs pa'i spyan rtsa bzlog pa yis //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i spyan rtsa bzlog pa yis //
translated: with his fearful eyes rolled back,

original: 'jigs pa yang ni mdzad pa'o //üîΩdam tshig sems dpa' lta bu yis //
analyzed: 'jigs pa yang ni mdzad pa'o // dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu yis //
translated: he also makes a frightening [face].

original: ye shes sems dpa' cher 'bar bsgom //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' cher 'bar bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the blazing great wisdom beingüîΩlike the commitment being.

original: de yi thugs kar sngags pa yis //
analyzed: de yi thugs kar sngags pa yis //
translated: In his heart, the mantra practitioner

original: mtshan ma sa bon bcas pa bsgom //
analyzed: mtshan ma sa bon bcas pa bsgom //
translated: meditates on the sign with the seed syllable.

original: skyon gsang sngags bzlas bya ste //
analyzed: skyon gsang sngags bzlas bya ste //
translated: Recite the mantra with the faults concealed,

original: lha yi rnam par sbyor bas so //üîΩde nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni //
analyzed: lha yi rnam par sbyor bas so // de nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni //
translated: united with the form of the deity.üîΩThen, there is no doubt

original: 'thob pa nyid du the tshom med //
analyzed: 'thob pa nyid du the tshom med //
translated: that one will attain the desired spiritual power.

original: de la 'di ni gsang sngags rgyal //
analyzed: de la 'di ni gsang sngags rgyal //
translated: Here is the king of mantras:

original: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
analyzed: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
translated: O·πÉ ca·πá·∏ça mahƒÅro·π£a·πáa h≈´·πÉ pha·π≠.üîΩWhatever virtue I have obtained

original: bdag gis bris pas gang thob pa //
analyzed: bdag gis bris pas gang thob pa //
translated: by writing this,

original: dge ba byang chub sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: dge ba byang chub sgrub byed pa //
translated: may it be for accomplishing enlightenment.

original: de yis 'jig rten ma lus 'di //
analyzed: de yis 'jig rten ma lus 'di //
translated: May it bring about the accomplishment of perfect enlightenment in all worlds without exception.
